pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

related.meaning: House of Councillors (upper house of the National Diet of Japan)
reference (e.g. to a dictionary, passage, footnotes)

lessons.japanese: １月１日は多くの日本人が神社にお参りする日です。
lessons.english: January 1st is a day when many Japanese go to the shrine.
